location.sjis: ボスタフ工房 ディックル村支部

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.ascii: What is it? Leave me alone.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: アカバネっていう凶暴な召喚獣と 戦おうって人いるらしいけど そんな怖いこと
portrait_l.ascii: I hear there's someone looking to go up against Red Wing.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: いったい何がおもしろいのかしら
portrait_l.ascii: I wonder what is so interesting about something so scary.
